content:
path /v3/litecoin/mempool
operationId LtcGetMempool
summary Get Mempool Transactions
description 1 credit per API call
Get Litecoin Transaction ids in the mempool
Examples of using this endpoint with the Tatum JS SDK can be found in Tatum LTC SDK
responses
200
schema
type array
items
type string
description TX ID of the transaction in mempool
description OK
